message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaBorder: Land is border of island and cannot be purchased.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaNotAvailable: This area is unavailable. Current owner: {0}
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgUnknownCommand: Unknown command. Please enter /Areas help for proper syntax.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAdminUnknownComman:
Unknown command. Available commands:
GetPlayerData <player name>
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAbandonAreaError: Error occured in abandon area process.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAbandonAreaUnassig: You cannot abandon an area that is not claimed!
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAbandonAreaNotOwne: You cannot abandon an area that is not yours!
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgHelpGeneral:
Welcome to Areas help!
You may use "/areas help commands" to see command list
You may find command specific help by entering "/areas help <command>".
Example: /areas help check
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgHelpCommands:
Some basic commands are:
"/areas check" - to check the plot you are on.
"/areas claim" - to claim the plot if available.
"/areas abandon" - to unclaim the land if you are the owner.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgHelpCheck:
Check the current location for ownership.
Syntax: /areas check
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgHelpClaim:
Attempt to claim the current area.
Syntax: /areas claim
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgHelpAbandon:
Attempt to abandon your ownership of the current area.
Syntax: /areas abandon
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaLimitHit: You already have the maximum areas allowed to own. Max Areas: {0}
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgNotEnoughPermissio: You do NOT have sufficient permissions to run that command!
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaNotOwned: You do not own this area!
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaFriendPreExist: {0} is already in the area friend list.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaFriendAddFailu: Failure to add {0} to area friend list.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaFriendRemoveSu: {0} has been removed from this area friend list.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaFriendRemoveFa: Failure to remove {0} from area friend list.
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgCmdFriendSubComman: Enter a sub-command! Syntax: /areas friends <add|remove> <player name>
message.ModPlayerOwnedAreasMsgAreaCheckIsFriend: You have permissions in this area.
